const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      term: {
        user: 'kimchy'
      }
    },
    sort: {
      _script: {
        type: 'number',
        script: {
          lang: 'painless',
          source: "doc['field_name'].value * params.factor",
          params: {
            factor: 1.1
          }
        },
        order: 'asc'
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
